title: Tokopedia Product Performance Daily Report
description: Daily report presenting the performance metrics for a specific product on Tokopedia

merchantID.description: A unique merchant code for GRAAS clients

siteNickNameId.description: A unique merchant's store code for GRAAS clients

Product_name.description: Name of the product being analyzed

SKU.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the product

Category.description: Category to which the product belongs

New_Net_Income.description: New net income information for the product

Sold_Products.description: Total number of units sold for the product

Product_Viewed.description: Total number of times the product was viewed

Basket.description: Total number of times the product was added to the shopping basket

Wishlist.description: Total number of times the product was added to the wishlist

Conversion.description: Conversion rate of the product as a decimal

Order.description: Total number of orders placed for the product

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'
